羯.definition: ram, esp. gelded; to castrate; deer's skin

羯族.definition: Jie people, a tribe of northern China around the 4th century

羯胡.definition: Jie people, a tribe of northern China around the 4th century

羯鼓.definition: double-ended skin drum with a narrow waist

羯鼓催花.definition: drumming to make apricots flower, cf joke by Tang Emperor Xuanzhong 唐玄宗, playing the drum in apricot blossom
